definition.name: Create Azure Container App Review Revisions
definition.description: GitHub Action to create a new Container App revision for PR review. github.com/Azure/Actions
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: resource-group
inputs.description: Name of the Resource Group in which the Container App will be created

inputs.name: image
inputs.description: Name of Container Image. If the `mode` input is `deactivate-revision`, this input is ignored.

inputs.name: revision-name-suffix
inputs.description: Suffixes for New Revision or Target Revision of deactivation. If the `mode` input is `deactivate-revision`, this input needs to be set.

inputs.name: deactivate-revision-mode
inputs.description: Enable Deactivation-Revision Mode of this action. `true` or `false`. Default value is `false`
